last_episode_to_air.name: 2070: Ecocide
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nicholas Bilton is on trial for crimes against the planet, but will the new Alpha CEO save him — and the world?

name: Extrapolations
overview: Eight interconnected stories told over 33 years explore how our planet’s changing climate will affect family, work, faith—and survival.
tagline: Who will fight for our future?

episodes.name: 2037: A Raven Story
episodes.overview: As nations fight over Earth’s fate, Rebecca, Marshall, and Junior all see their plans go up in smoke.

episodes.name: 2046: Whale Fall
episodes.overview: Rebecca, a marine biologist, strives to connect with a humpback whale before it’s too late.

episodes.name: 2047: The Fifth Question
episodes.overview: As Miami’s waters rise, Rabbi Zucker gets an intriguing offer from the father of a young woman preparing for her bat mitzvah.

episodes.name: 2059: Face of God
episodes.overview: Jonathan suspects his ex-wife’s latest invention—a pilotless, solar-powered plane—isn’t what it seems.

episodes.name: 2059 Part II: Nightbirds
episodes.overview: In Mumbai, small-time criminal Gaurav and his unexpected companion Neel must complete a high-stakes mission.

episodes.name: 2066: Lola
episodes.overview: Natasha, a single mom in London, braves the world of artificial companionship, until she rents a partner she can’t forget.

episodes.name: 2068: The Going-Away Party
episodes.overview: Auggie and Sylvie throw an intimate New Year’s Eve party where he makes a surprise announcement.

episodes.name: 2070: Ecocide
episodes.overview: Nicholas Bilton is on trial for crimes against the planet, but will the new Alpha CEO save him — and the world?
